text: The 2015–16 Gimnàstic de Tarragona's season was the 129th season in the club's existence and the first in Segunda División since being promoted from the third level of the Spanish football after defeating SD Huesca in the play- offs. Nàstic returned to the second tier after a three-year absence. ==Players== ===Squad=== Jugadors (Players) ; Gimnàstic's official website.
